sn35.246:1.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va cakkhuvinneyyesu rupesu uppajjeyya chando va rago va doso va moho va patigham vapi cetaso, tato cittam nivareyya.
sn35.246:1.2: Sabhayo ceso maggo sappatibhayo ca sakantako ca sagahano ca ummaggo ca kummaggo ca duhitiko ca.
sn35.246:1.3: Asappurisasevito ceso maggo, na ceso maggo sappurisehi sevito.
sn35.246:1.6: yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va jivhavinneyyesu rasesu …pe…
sn35.246:1.7: manovinneyyesu dhammesu uppajjeyya chando va rago va doso va moho va patigham vapi cetaso tato cittam nivareyya.
sn35.246:1.8: Sabhayo ceso maggo sappatibhayo ca sakantako ca sagahano ca ummaggo ca kummaggo ca duhitiko ca.
sn35.246:1.9: Asappurisasevito ceso maggo, na ceso maggo sappurisehi sevito.
sn35.246:2.2: Kittharakkho ca pamatto, gono ca kitthado adum kittham otaritva yavadattham madam apajjeyya pamadam apajjeyya;
sn35.246:2.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano chasu phassayatanesu asamvutakari pancasu kamagunesu yavadattham madam apajjati pamadam apajjati.
sn35.246:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kittham sampannam kittharakkho ca appamatto gono ca kitthado adum kittham otareyya.
sn35.246:3.3: Nasayam suggahitam gahetva uparighatayam suniggahitam nigganheyya.
sn35.246:3.4: Uparighatayam suniggahitam niggahetva dandena sutalitam taleyya.
sn35.246:3.7: tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, gono kitthado adum kittham otareyya.
sn35.246:3.9: Nasayam suggahitam gahetva uparighatayam suniggahitam nigganheyya.
sn35.246:3.10: Uparighatayam suniggahitam niggahetva dandena sutalitam taleyya.
sn35.246:3.12: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, gono kitthado gamagato va arannagato va, thanabahulo va assa nisajjabahulo va na tam kittham puna otareyya—
sn35.246:3.14: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yato kho bhikkhuno chasu phassayatanesu cittam udujitam hoti sudujitam, ajjhattameva santitthati, sannisidati, ekodi hoti, samadhiyati.
sn35.246:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno va rajamahamattassa va vinaya saddo assutapubbo assa.
sn35.246:4.4: ‘ambho, kassa nu kho eso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evammucchaniyo evambandhaniyo’ti?
sn35.246:4.6: ‘esa, kho, bhante, vina nama, yassa eso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evammucchaniyo evambandhaniyo’ti.
sn35.246:4.11: ‘ayam kho sa, bhante, vina yassa eso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evammucchaniyo evambandhaniyo’ti.
sn35.246:4.13: ‘alam me, bho, taya vinaya, tameva me saddam aharatha’ti.
sn35.246:4.15: ‘ayam kho, bhante, vina nama anekasambhara mahasambhara.
sn35.246:4.17: doninca paticca cammanca paticca dandanca paticca upadharane ca paticca tantiyo ca paticca konanca paticca purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca evayam, bhante, vina nama anekasambhara mahasambhara.
sn35.246:4.19: So tam vinam dasadha va satadha va phaleyya, dasadha va satadha va tam phaletva sakalikam sakalikam kareyya.
sn35.246:4.20: Sakalikam sakalikam karitva aggina daheyya, aggina dahitva masim kareyya.
sn35.246:4.21: Masim karitva mahavate va ophuneyya, nadiya va sighasotaya pavaheyya.
sn35.246:4.23: ‘asati kirayam, bho, vina nama, yathevam yam kinci vina nama ettha ca panayam jano ativelam pamatto palalito’ti.
sn35.246:4.24: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rupam samanvesati yavata rupassa gati, vedanam samanvesati yavata vedanaya gati, sannam samanvesati yavata sannaya gati, sankhare samanvesati yavata sankharanam gati, vinnanam samanvesati yavata vinnanassa gati.
sn35.246:4.25: Tassa rupam samanvesato yavata rupassa gati, vedanam samanvesato …pe…
sn35.246:4.29: Yampissa tam hoti ahanti va mamanti va asmiti va tampi tassa na hoti”ti.
